item.title: Puty add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "But I don’t want to go among mad people," Alice remarked. "Oh, you can’t help that," said the Cat: "we’re all mad here. I’m mad. You’re mad." "How do you know I’m mad?" said Alice. "You must be," said the Cat, or you wouldn’t have come here." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Puty add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Begin at the beginning," the King said, very gravely, "and go on till you come to the end: then stop." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Puty add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "What makes the desert beautiful,' said the little prince, 'is that somewhere it hides a well..." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Puty add a quote by Lynn Messina
item.description: "Childhood friends are continuity, uninterrupted connections between selves, and you hold on them. You hold on them and you love them, but sometimes they're not quite comfortable." -- Lynn Messina

item.title: Puty add a quote by Lynn Messina
item.description: "But life is not like that. You are not an airline. You can't remove a single olive from every salad served in first class and save one point two million dollars." -- Lynn Messina

item.title: Puty add a quote by Goenawan Mohamad
item.description: "Kemampuan membaca itu sebuah rahmat. Kegemaran membaca; sebuah kebahagiaan." -- Goenawan Mohamad

item.title: Puty add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Puty add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Puty add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Adventure without risk is Disneyland." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Puty add a quote by Marian Keyes
item.description: "What doesn't kill us makes us funnier." -- Marian Keyes

item.title: Puty add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Puty add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "She wants to know if I love her, that's all anyone wants from anyone else, not love itself but the knowledge that love is there, like new batteries in the flashlight in the emergency kit in the hall closet." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Puty add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "So many people enter and leave your life! Hundreds of thousands of people! You have to keep the door open so they can come in! But it also means you have to let them go!" -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Puty add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "That’s one of the disadvantages of getting older; you’re inclined to make intimate contacts with fewer people." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Puty add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Puty add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Puty add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Who said nights were for sleep?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Puty add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Puty add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Spend your money on the things money can buy. Spend your time on the things money can’t buy." -- Haruki Murakami
